data.title: The nag hammadi library, the definitive translation of the gnostic scriptures complete in one volume james robinson
data.meta_description: The nag hammadi library, the definitive translation of the gnostic scriptures complete in one volume   james robinson - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text: This document provides an introduction to the revised third edition of The Nag Hammadi Library in English. It lists the contributors to the volume and explains that the first edition aimed to make the texts available, while subsequent scholarship has focused on interpreting the texts. The Nag Hammadi codices contain over 50 tractates in Coptic, comprising 45 separate works that mostly derive from early Christian Gnostic sects. This edition thoroughly revises the translations to incorporate newer scholarly insights over the past decade.
